text.name: Sewing
text.desc:
On Hit with this Skill: heal 10% of the HP damage dealt (max 10)
[WhenUse] Consume up to 40 [BloodDinner] and gain 1 [BloodScissorPersonalityFirst] for every 8 [BloodDinner] this unit consumed
- If this unit failed to consume [BloodDinner], gain +2 [Laceration] Count

- If this unit failed to consume [BloodDinner], gain +2 [Laceration] Count

text.name: I'll Make You a New Dress!
text.desc:
On Hit with this Skill: heal 30% of the HP damage dealt (max 20)
[BeforeAttack] At 10+ [BloodScissorPersonalityFirst], Atk Weight +1
[WhenUse] If target has 5+ [Laceration], Coin Power +1
[WhenUse] Clash Power +1 for every 6 [Laceration] on target (max 2)
[EndSkill] Consume 15 [BloodScissorPersonalityFirst] for every Atk Weight gained
[EndSkill] If target is killed, increase [BloodDinner] by 10. Regain half of [BloodScissorPersonalityFirst] consumed by this Skill (once per turn)
coinDescs:
[OnSucceedAttack] At 10+ [BloodScissorPersonalityFirst], deal +([BloodScissorPersonalityFirst] x 2)% damage (max 38%)
- At 20+ [BloodScissorPersonalityFirst], deal +([BloodScissorPersonalityFirst] x 3)% damage instead (max 90%)

text.name: I'll Make You a New Dress!
text.desc:
On Hit with this Skill: heal 30% of the HP damage dealt (max 20)
[BeforeAttack] At 10+ [BloodScissorPersonalityFirst], Atk Weight +1
- At 20+ [BloodScissorPersonalityFirst], replace the above effect with Atk Weight +2 instead
[WhenUse] If target has 5+ [Laceration], Coin Power +1
[WhenUse] Clash Power +1 for every 6 [Laceration] on target (max 2)
[EndSkill] Consume 10 [BloodScissorPersonalityFirst] for every Atk Weight gained
[EndSkill] If target is killed, increase [BloodDinner] by 20. Regain half of [BloodScissorPersonalityFirst] consumed by this Skill (once per turn)
- If target is [LineCuttingPersonality], additionally increase [BloodDinner] by 20 more, and gain 5 [BloodScissorPersonalityFirst] (once per turn)
coinDescs:
[OnSucceedAttack] At 10+ [BloodScissorPersonalityFirst], deal +([BloodScissorPersonalityFirst] x 3)% damage (max 57%)
- At 20+ [BloodScissorPersonalityFirst], deal +([BloodScissorPersonalityFirst] x 4)% damage instead (max 120%)

text.name: Quite Discourteous!
text.desc:
[WhenUse] At 10+ [BloodScissorPersonalityFirst], Base Power +1
[WhenUse] At 5+ [Laceration], Coin Power +1

text.name: Quite Discourteous!
text.desc:
[WhenUse] At 10+ [BloodScissorPersonalityFirst], Base Power +1
- At 20+ [BloodScissorPersonalityFirst], gain Base Power +2 instead
[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 5 [Laceration] on self (max 3)

1111121.name: Don Quixote Hardblood Arts 8: Scissors
1111121.desc:
1 ally with the fastest Speed: if the enemy is killed After Attack, heal 10 HP (2 times per turn)
1 ally with the fastest Speed: if the enemy is killed After Attack, inflict +1 [Laceration] Count when inflicting [Laceration] Potency with Skill or Coin effects for the next turn (3 times per turn)

1111101.name: WRONG COSTUME!!!
1111101.desc: On Hit, deal +1% damage for every 10 [BloodDinner_Accumulation] by self (max 20%)

1111102.name: Bloodfeast
1111102.desc:
If this unit is on field, or is one of the units that can appear on this Stage, increase [BloodDinner] value by the amount of [Laceration] damage collectively received by every unit. 
When this unit enters the field, the sleeping blood drenching the battlefield will rise above the surface.

1111111.name: WRONG COSTUME!!!
1111111.desc:
In a Clash against [LineCuttingPersonality], Clash Power +1.
On Hit, deal +1.5% damage for every 10 [BloodDinner_Accumulation] by self (max 30%)
On Hit, deal +0.5% damage for every [Laceration] on the target (max 10%)

notes.short: Consumes {status:BloodDinner} to gain {status:BloodScissorPersonalityFirst}. Consume multiples of 10 to increase atk weight and damage of her S3. Inflicts {status:LineCuttingPersonality} for a turn with her S2, increasing the target's damage taken based on its {status:Laceration} stack and increases {sinner:11}'s {status:Laceration} application when attacking it.
notes.full:
Consumes {status:BloodDinner} to gain {status:BloodScissorPersonalityFirst} on her S1 and S2. Gains {status:Laceration} if she fails to consume {status:BloodDinner}. Having 10+ {status:BloodScissorPersonalityFirst} gives her 1 {status:AttackUp} and 1 {status:DefenseUp} and having 20+ gives her an additional {status:AttackUp}. Her S3 consumes either 10 or 20 stacks to gain +1 atk weight per 10 stacks consumed and bonus damage on her last coin. Killing her target with her S3 generates some bonus {status:BloodDinner} and returns half of the {status:BloodScissorPersonalityFirst} she consumed.

Her S2 inflicts {status:LineCuttingPersonality} for a turn, increasing her target's damage received based on its {status:Laceration} stacks. She inflicts more {status:Laceration} with her S1 and S2 when her target has {status:LineCuttingPersonality}. It also increases the {status:BloodDinner} generated and {status:BloodScissorPersonalityFirst} returned on kill with her S3. If her passive is active, {status:LineCuttingPersonality} also increases her Clash Power against the target. Her passive also increases her damage based on her {status:BloodDinner_Accumulation} and her target's {status:Laceration}.

All her skills also heal her based on damage dealt.
